item.title: Giving (Negative) Feedback From Engineers to Managers
item.description: A couple of weeks ago my friend Miguel Garcia Lorenzo releases this quite interesting post about the continuous feedback from the engineering managers. I agree with all the contents of the posts, but I want to add some comments or ideas from the engineer’s point of view (it’s more about the point of view of a non-manager person). It’s obvious not all people have the same personality, priorities, and communication skills, and the comments I will write in the next lines don’t apply to all people.
